original_text: Pharaoh's cup was in my hand, and I took the grapes and pressed them into Pharaoh's cup and placed the cup in Pharaoh's hand.”
korean_text: 내 손에 바로의 잔이 있기로 내가 포도를 따서 그 즙을 바로의 잔에 짜서 그 잔을 바로의 손에 드렸노라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh's cup was in my hand
and pressed them into Pharaoh's cup
and placed the cup in Pharaoh's hand
